name: Litti Chokha
description: Wheat balls stuffed with spiced sattu served with mashed vegetables.
instructions: Prepare dough using wheat flour, salt, and water. Rest 20 minutes.
Mix sattu, onion, mustard oil, ajwain, lemon juice, and salt.
Stuff dough balls with sattu mixture.
Roast brinjal and tomatoes directly on flame.
Mash with potatoes, onion, green chilies, mustard oil, and salt.
Serve litti dipped in ghee with chokha.
